message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth more than $10000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is a fantastic deal considering its market value and the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
